name: Barbarian
description: A fierce warrior of primal rage who can enter a battle frenzy to withstand damage and deal devastating blows.

features.name: Rage
features.description: You can enter a rage as a bonus action, gaining damage resistance and bonus damage.

features.name: Unarmored Defense
features.description: While not wearing armor, your AC equals 10 + DEX modifier + CON modifier.

features.name: Weapon Mastery
features.description: You can use the mastery properties of weapons you are proficient with.

features.name: Danger Sense
features.description: You have advantage on Dexterity saves against effects you can see.

features.name: Primal Path
features.description: You choose a path that shapes your rage.

name: Bard
description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation.

features.name: Bardic Inspiration
features.description: You can inspire others through stirring words or music, granting them a bonus die.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You can cast bard spells using Charisma as your spellcasting ability.

features.name: Expertise
features.description: Choose two skills to double your proficiency bonus for.

features.name: Jack of All Trades
features.description: Add half proficiency to checks that don't already include it.

features.name: Bard Subclass
features.description: You choose a college that grants you special features.

name: Cleric
description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You can cast cleric spells using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability.

features.name: Divine Order
features.description: Choose between Protector (armor/weapons) or Thaumaturge (extra magic/skills).

features.name: Channel Divinity
features.description: You can channel divine energy to fuel magical effects like Turn Undead.

features.name: Cleric Subclass
features.description: You choose a divine domain that grants you special powers.

name: Druid
description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature and adopting animal forms.

features.name: Druidic
features.description: You know Druidic, the secret language of druids.

features.name: Primal Order
features.description: Choose between Magician (more magic) or Warden (better armor/weapons).

features.name: Wild Shape
features.description: You can magically assume the shape of a beast that you have seen before.

features.name: Druid Subclass
features.description: You choose a circle that grants you special features.

name: Fighter
description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor.

features.name: Fighting Style
features.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty.

features.name: Second Wind
features.description: You can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level.

features.name: Weapon Mastery
features.description: You can use the mastery properties of weapons you are proficient with.

features.name: Action Surge
features.description: You can take one additional action on your turn.

features.name: Fighter Subclass
features.description: You choose a subclass that represents your martial specialization.

name: Monk
description: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection.

features.name: Martial Arts
features.description: You master combat styles using unarmed strikes and monk weapons, using Dex instead of Str.

features.name: Unarmored Defense
features.description: While not wearing armor, your AC equals 10 + DEX modifier + WIS modifier.

features.name: Monk's Focus
features.description: You gain Focus Points (formerly Ki) to fuel special abilities like Flurry of Blows.

features.name: Deflect Attacks
features.description: You can use your reaction to reduce damage from weapon attacks.

features.name: Monk Subclass
features.description: You choose a tradition that grants you special features.

name: Paladin
description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath, wielding both divine magic and martial prowess.

features.name: Lay on Hands
features.description: You have a pool of healing power that replenishes on long rest.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You can cast paladin spells using Charisma as your spellcasting ability.

features.name: Paladin's Smite
features.description: You always have Divine Smite prepared and can cast it once without a slot.

features.name: Channel Divinity
features.description: You can channel divine energy to fuel magical effects.

features.name: Paladin Subclass
features.description: You swear an oath that grants you special features.

name: Ranger
description: A warrior who uses martial prowess and nature magic to combat threats on the edges of civilization.

features.name: Favored Enemy
features.description: You always have Hunter's Mark prepared and can cast it without a spell slot a number of times.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You can cast ranger spells using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability.

features.name: Deft Explorer
features.description: You gain Expertise in a skill and learn two languages.

features.name: Ranger Subclass
features.description: You choose a subclass that reflects your ranger training.

name: Rogue
description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies.

features.name: Sneak Attack
features.description: Once per turn, you can deal extra damage to one creature you hit if you have advantage or an ally nearby.

features.name: Expertise
features.description: Choose two skills to double your proficiency bonus for.

features.name: Cunning Action
features.description: You can use a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide on each turn.

features.name: Rogue Subclass
features.description: You choose a subclass that reflects your criminal expertise.

features.name: Cunning Strike
features.description: You can trade Sneak Attack damage dice for special effects like tripping or poisoning.

name: Sorcerer
description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline.

features.name: Innate Sorcery
features.description: You can unleash a surge of magic to increase your save DC and gain advantage on spell attacks.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You can cast sorcerer spells using Charisma as your spellcasting ability.

features.name: Font of Magic
features.description: You can tap into a wellspring of magic within yourself (Sorcery Points).

features.name: Metamagic
features.description: You gain the ability to twist your spells to suit your needs.

features.name: Sorcerer Subclass
features.description: Choose a sorcerous origin that describes the source of your magic.

name: Warlock
description: A wielder of magic derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity.

features.name: Pact Magic
features.description: You can cast warlock spells using Charisma. Your spell slots recharge on a short rest.

features.name: Eldritch Invocations
features.description: You gain eldritch invocations, fragments of forbidden knowledge.

features.name: Magical Cunning
features.description: You can perform a rite to regain half your expended Pact Magic slots.

features.name: Warlock Subclass
features.description: You choose an otherworldly patron that grants you powers.

name: Wizard
description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality through careful study and arcane formulas.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You can cast wizard spells using Intelligence as your spellcasting ability.

features.name: Arcane Recovery
features.description: Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can recover some expended spell slots.

features.name: Scholar
features.description: You gain Expertise in an academic skill (Arcana, History, Nature, etc).

features.name: Wizard Subclass
features.description: You choose a subclass that represents your magical specialty.

features.name: Memorize Spell
features.description: You can swap out prepared spells on a short rest.

name: Artificer
description: Masters of invention, artificers use ingenuity and magic to unlock extraordinary capabilities in objects.

features.name: Magical Tinkering
features.description: You can imbue mundane objects with minor magical properties.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You can cast artificer spells using Intelligence as your spellcasting ability.

features.name: Infuse Item
features.description: You can imbue mundane items with certain infusions to turn them into magic items.

features.name: Artificer Specialist
features.description: You choose a specialist archetype that grants you special features.

name: Blood Hunter
description: A warrior who uses hemocraft magic to hunt monsters, often at a cost to their own vitality.

features.name: HunterBS Bane
features.description: You have advantage on tracking fey, fiends, and undead.

features.name: Blood Maledict
features.description: You can unleash blood curses to debilitate your enemies.

features.name: Crimson Rite
features.description: You can ignite your weapon with elemental energy at the cost of hit points.

features.name: Blood Hunter Order
features.description: You commit to an order of blood hunters.

name: Accursed
description: Afflicted with a permanent magic curse, accurseds harness the power of their affliction to their own ends.

features.name: Conquered Curse
features.description: You choose the nature of the curse you conquered (e.g., Lycanthropy, Lichdom).

features.name: Jinx
features.description: You can bestow minor curses on creatures to hinder their checks or attacks.

features.name: Malediction Metamorphosis
features.description: Your curse evolves, granting you new capabilities and mutations.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You use your curse's vile magicks to fuel spells.

name: Alchemist
description: A master of chemical reactions, creating volatile bombs and potent potions.

features.name: Bombs
features.description: You can create volatile alchemical bombs to throw at enemies.

features.name: Natural Philosopher
features.description: You gain bonuses to identify herbs, potions, and poisons.

features.name: Field of Study
features.description: You specialize in a specific application of alchemy.

features.name: Reagent
features.description: You have a pool of reagent dice used to brew potions or boost bombs.

name: Beastheart
description: An adventurer who forms a supernatural bond with a wild creature, fighting in tandem.

features.name: Companion
features.description: You gain a wild companion that fights alongside you and grows in power.

features.name: Natural Language
features.description: You can communicate with your companion and other beasts.

features.name: Primal Exploits
features.description: You channel your companion's ferocity into special combat maneuvers.

features.name: Companion Bond
features.description: You choose the specific nature of the bond you share (e.g., Hunter, Infernal).

name: Blood Mage
description: A mage who fuels their arcane power with their own life essence and blood.

features.name: Arcane Blood Mass
features.description: You sacrifice HP to create a floating orb of blood that acts as your focus.

features.name: Blood Focus
features.description: You choose a specific philosophy of blood magic.

features.name: Blood Analysis
features.description: You can analyze blood to learn details about the creature it came from.

name: Captain
description: A decisive leader and strategist who inspires allies and commands a loyal cohort.

features.name: Born Leader
features.description: You gain advantage on Persuasion checks to give orders or take charge.

features.name: Fighting Style
features.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting.

features.name: Cohort
features.description: You gain a loyal lieutenant who fights by your side.

features.name: Banner
features.description: You adopt a banner representing your leadership style.

name: Craftsman
description: A virtuoso artisan who forges masterwork equipment and invents ingenious devices.

features.name: Exotic Proficiencies
features.description: You gain proficiency with exotic weapons and armor.

features.name: Active Crafting
features.description: You can craft items rapidly during long rests.

features.name: Masterwork
features.description: You can create high-quality weapons and armor with special properties.

features.name: Artisans' Guild
features.description: You join a guild that defines your crafting specialty.

name: Gunslinger
description: A bold renegade who relies on black powder, grit, and luck to survive.

features.name: Quick Draw
features.description: You add your proficiency bonus to initiative and interact with firearms faster.

features.name: Risk
features.description: You use Risk Dice to perform deeds of daring and precision.

features.name: Gunslinger's Creed
features.description: You adopt a creed that guides your gunfighting style.

name: Illrigger
description: A knight of Hell, a charismatic counter-paladin who commands devils and sows discord.

features.name: Forked Tongue
features.description: You are adept at manipulation and speak Infernal.

features.name: Infernal Conduit
features.description: You have a pool of dice to drain life from enemies or heal allies.

features.name: Baleful Interdict
features.description: You can place seals on enemies that detonate for damage when they are hit.

features.name: Diabolic Contract
features.description: You sign a contract with an archdevil, defining your subclass.

name: Investigator
description: A supernatural detective and monster slayer who uses rituals and trinkets to combat the occult.

features.name: Ritualist
features.description: You have a grimoire of ritual spells you can cast.

features.name: Myths and Legends
features.description: You have advantage on checks to research monsters and lore.

features.name: Occult Specialization
features.description: You choose a field of expertise in handling threats.

name: Martyr
description: A chosen of the gods fated to die for a cause, growing stronger as they suffer.

features.name: Mortal Burden
features.description: You choose the burden (subclass) that defines your inevitable death.

features.name: Ordained Death
features.description: You are harder to kill until your destined time; you need 5 failed death saves to die.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You cast spells by sacrificing your own hit points.

name: Necromancer
description: A master of death who animates thralls and manipulates life force.

features.name: Charnel Touch
features.description: You can unleash necrotic energy to harm the living or heal the undead.

features.name: Thralls
features.description: You can animate and permanently control a number of undead servants.

features.name: Grave Ambition
features.description: You choose the path of your necromantic research.

name: Pugilist
description: A rough-and-tumble brawler who relies on grit, moxie, and bare knuckles.

features.name: Fisticuffs
features.description: You master unarmed combat, dealing d6 damage and grappling as a bonus action.

features.name: Iron Chin
features.description: Your AC equals 12 + Con modifier when unarmored.

features.name: Moxie
features.description: You use Moxie points to fuel abilities like bracing for damage.

features.name: Fight Club
features.description: You join a Fight Club that defines your brawling style.

name: Warden
description: A vigilant guardian who draws on primal strength to protect a charge.

features.name: Sentinel's Stand
features.description: You choose a defensive bonus (Armor, HP, or Saves).

features.name: Warden's Grasp
features.description: You can lock down enemies near you, preventing them from moving away.

features.name: Warden's Mark
features.description: You mark enemies to hinder their attacks against your allies.

features.name: Champion's Call
features.description: You choose the nature of the duty you have sworn to uphold.

name: Warmage
description: A master of cantrips and battlefield tactics who treats magic as a weapon.

features.name: Arcane Initiation
features.description: You choose where you learned your magic, gaining specific cantrips.

features.name: Warmage Edge
features.description: You deal extra damage with cantrips based on your Intelligence.

features.name: Warmage Tricks
features.description: You learn magical tricks to enhance your cantrips and utility.

features.name: Warmage House
features.description: You join a House that teaches specific tactical doctrines.

name: Witch
description: A spellcaster stricken by a dark curse, using hexes and familiars to survive.

features.name: Witch's Curse
features.description: You are afflicted by a curse (e.g., Burned, Feral) that grants power at a cost.

features.name: Hexes
features.description: You can cast minor curses to debilitating effect.

features.name: Cackle
features.description: You can use a bonus action to extend the duration of your hexes.

features.name: Witch's Craft
features.description: You choose a craft that defines your magical specialization.

name: Acolyte
description: Mortal agents of immortal causes who bring cosmic power into their bodies and souls.

features.name: Acolyte Archetype
features.description: You choose an archetype reflecting the cosmic being you serve (e.g., Togashi, Shadows).

features.name: Ego Synthesis
features.description: You gain inspiration when you complete a long rest.

features.name: Renewing Purpose
features.description: You can spend inspiration to regain use of class features on a failure.

name: Adept
description: Wielders of psionic power who use inner focus and will to manipulate energy and matter.

features.name: Prime Talents
features.description: You know psi blast and two prime talents (psionic powers).

features.name: Psychic Paradigm
features.description: You choose a paradigm determining the source of your abilities.

features.name: Intellect Fortress
features.description: You have advantage on saves vs charmed or frightened.

features.name: Psionic Combat
features.description: You can use psionic combat modes to enhance offense or defense.

name: Animal Master
description: An adventurer who has trained a loyal animal companion to fight by their side.

features.name: Beast Companion
features.description: You gain a beast companion that obeys your commands and fights with you.

name: Apothecary
description: A practiced medical expert and arcane user who wields knowledge to heal and harm.

features.name: Apothecary Magic
features.description: You cast spells using a formula book and Intelligence.

features.name: Occult Practices
features.description: You choose a discipline of research (e.g., Alienist, Chemist).

features.name: Esoteric Theories
features.description: You learn forbidden lore to augment your abilities.

name: School of Evocation
description: You focus your study on magic that creates powerful elemental effects such as bitter cold, searing flame, rolling thunder, crackling lightning, and burning acid.

features.name: Evocation Savant
features.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy an evocation spell into your spellbook is halved.

features.name: Sculpt Spells
features.description: When you cast an evocation spell that affects other creatures, you can choose a number of them equal to 1 + the spell's level to automatically succeed on their saving throws.

features.name: Potent Cantrip
features.description: Your damaging cantrips affect even creatures that avoid the brunt of the effect.

features.name: Empowered Evocation
features.description: You can add your Intelligence modifier to one damage roll of any wizard evocation spell you cast.

features.name: Overchannel
features.description: You can increase the power of your simpler spells to deal maximum damage.

name: School of Abjuration
description: The School of Abjuration emphasizes magic that blocks, banishes, or protects. Detractors of this school say that its tradition is about denial, negation rather than positive assertion.

features.name: Abjuration Savant
features.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy an abjuration spell into your spellbook is halved.

features.name: Arcane Ward
features.description: You can weave magic around yourself for protection. When you cast an abjuration spell, you create a magical ward.

features.name: Projected Ward
features.description: When a creature you can see within 30 feet takes damage, you can use your reaction to cause your Arcane Ward to absorb that damage.

features.name: Improved Abjuration
features.description: When you cast an abjuration spell that requires you to make an ability check, you add your proficiency bonus to that check.

features.name: Spell Resistance
features.description: You have advantage on saving throws against spells.

name: School of Necromancy
description: The School of Necromancy explores the cosmic forces of life, death, and undeath. As you focus your studies in this tradition, you learn to manipulate the energy that animates all living things.

features.name: Necromancy Savant
features.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy a necromancy spell into your spellbook is halved.

features.name: Grim Harvest
features.description: Once per turn when you kill a creature with a spell, you regain hit points.

features.name: Undead Thralls
features.description: You add the Animate Dead spell to your spellbook if it's not there already. When you cast it, you can target one additional corpse or pile of bones.

features.name: Inured to Undeath
features.description: You have resistance to necrotic damage, and your hit point maximum can't be reduced.

features.name: Command Undead
features.description: You can use magic to bring undead under your control, even those created by other wizards.

name: School of Illusion
description: You focus your studies on magic that dazzles the senses, befuddles the mind, and tricks even the wisest folk.

features.name: Illusion Savant
features.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy an illusion spell into your spellbook is halved.

features.name: Improved Minor Illusion
features.description: You learn the Minor Illusion cantrip. You can create both a sound and an image with a single casting of the spell.

features.name: Malleable Illusions
features.description: When you cast an illusion spell with a duration of 1 minute or longer, you can use your action to change the nature of that illusion.

features.name: Illusory Self
features.description: When a creature makes an attack roll against you, you can use your reaction to interpose an illusory duplicate.

features.name: Illusory Reality
features.description: You can choose one inanimate, nonmagical object that is part of an illusion spell and make that object real.

name: Circle of Stars
description: The Circle of Stars allows druids to draw on the power of starlight, observing the cosmos and harnessing the energy of constellations.

features.name: Star Map
features.description: You have created a star chart as part of your heavenly studies. You gain the Guidance cantrip and can cast Guiding Bolt without expending a spell slot a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus.

features.name: Starry Form
features.description: As a bonus action, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape to take on a starry form, gaining benefits based on the constellation you choose (Archer, Chalice, or Dragon).

features.name: Cosmic Omen
features.description: Whenever you finish a long rest, you can consult your Star Map to gain a reaction to aid allies or hinder foes based on the roll of a d6 (Weal or Woe).

features.name: Twinkling Constellations
features.description: Your Starry Form improves. The Archer and Chalice constellations deal more damage/healing, and Dragon grants flight speed.

features.name: Full of Stars
features.description: While in your Starry Form, you become partially incorporeal, gaining resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

name: Champion
description: The archetypal Champion focuses on the development of raw physical power honed to deadly perfection.

features.name: Improved Critical
features.description: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

features.name: Remarkable Athlete
features.description: You can add half your proficiency bonus to any Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution check you make that doesn't already use your proficiency bonus.

features.name: Additional Fighting Style
features.description: You can choose a second option from the Fighting Style class feature.

features.name: Superior Critical
features.description: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20.

features.name: Survivor
features.description: At the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points if you have no more than half your hit points left.

name: Battle Master
description: Those who emulate the archetypal Battle Master employ martial techniques passed down through generations.

features.name: Combat Superiority
features.description: You learn maneuvers that are fueled by special dice called superiority dice.

features.name: Student of War
features.description: You gain proficiency with one type of artisan's tools.

features.name: Know Your Enemy
features.description: If you spend at least 1 minute observing or interacting with another creature, you can learn certain information about its capabilities.

features.name: Improved Combat Superiority
features.description: Your superiority dice turn into d10s.

features.name: Relentless
features.description: When you roll initiative and have no superiority dice remaining, you regain 1 superiority die.

name: Eldritch Knight
description: The archetypal Eldritch Knight combines the martial mastery common to all fighters with a careful study of magic.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You augment your martial prowess with the ability to cast spells from the wizard spell list.

features.name: Weapon Bond
features.description: You learn a ritual that creates a magical bond between yourself and one weapon.

features.name: War Magic
features.description: When you use your action to cast a cantrip, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

features.name: Eldritch Strike
features.description: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, that creature has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes against a spell you cast.

features.name: Arcane Charge
features.description: When you use your Action Surge, you can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

name: Life Domain
description: The Life domain focuses on the vibrant positive energy that sustains all life.

features.name: Bonus Proficiency
features.description: You gain proficiency with heavy armor.

features.name: Disciple of Life
features.description: Your healing spells are more effective. Whenever you use a spell to restore hit points, the creature regains additional hit points.

features.name: Channel Divinity: Preserve Life
features.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to heal the badly injured.

features.name: Blessed Healer
features.description: The healing spells you cast on others heal you as well.

features.name: Divine Strike
features.description: You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy.

features.name: Supreme Healing
features.description: When you would normally roll one or more dice to restore hit points with a spell, you instead use the highest number possible for each die.

name: Light Domain
description: Gods of light promote the ideals of rebirth and renewal, truth, vigilance, and beauty.

features.name: Bonus Cantrip
features.description: You gain the Light cantrip.

features.name: Warding Flare
features.description: You can interpose divine light between yourself and an attacking enemy.

features.name: Channel Divinity: Radiance of the Dawn
features.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to harness sunlight, banishing darkness and dealing radiant damage.

features.name: Improved Flare
features.description: You can use your Warding Flare feature to protect someone else when a creature you can see attacks them.

features.name: Potent Spellcasting
features.description: You add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with any cleric cantrip.

features.name: Corona of Light
features.description: You can use your action to activate an aura of sunlight.

name: War Domain
description: War has many manifestations. It can make heroes of ordinary people. It can be desperate and horrific, with acts of cruelty and cowardice.

features.name: Bonus Proficiencies
features.description: You gain proficiency with martial weapons and heavy armor.

features.name: War Priest
features.description: When you use the Attack action, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

features.name: Channel Divinity: Guided Strike
features.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to strike with supernatural accuracy.

features.name: Channel Divinity: War God's Blessing
features.description: When a creature within 30 feet makes an attack roll, you can use your reaction to grant a +10 bonus.

features.name: Divine Strike
features.description: You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy.

features.name: Avatar of Battle
features.description: You gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons.

name: Thief
description: You hone your skills in the larcenous arts. Burglars, bandits, cutpurses, and other criminals typically follow this archetype.

features.name: Fast Hands
features.description: You can use the bonus action granted by your Cunning Action to make a Sleight of Hand check, use your thieves' tools, or take the Use an Object action.

features.name: Second-Story Work
features.description: You gain the ability to climb faster than normal.

features.name: Supreme Sneak
features.description: You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks if you move no more than half your speed on the same turn.

features.name: Use Magic Device
features.description: You ignore all class, race, and level requirements on the use of magic items.

features.name: Thief's Reflexes
features.description: You can take two turns during the first round of any combat.

name: Assassin
description: You focus your training on the grim art of death. Those who adhere to this archetype are diverse: hired killers, spies, bounty hunters.

features.name: Bonus Proficiencies
features.description: You gain proficiency with the disguise kit and the poisoner's kit.

features.name: Assassinate
features.description: You have advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn in combat yet.

features.name: Infiltration Expertise
features.description: You can unfailingly create false identities for yourself.

features.name: Impostor
features.description: You gain the ability to unerringly mimic another person's speech, writing, and behavior.

features.name: Death Strike
features.description: When you attack and hit a creature that is surprised, it must make a Constitution saving throw or double the damage of your attack.

name: Arcane Trickster
description: Some rogues enhance their fine-honed skills of stealth and agility with magic, learning tricks of enchantment and illusion.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You gain the ability to cast spells from the wizard spell list, focusing on enchantment and illusion.

features.name: Mage Hand Legerdemain
features.description: When you cast Mage Hand, you can make the spectral hand invisible, and you can perform additional tasks with it.

features.name: Magical Ambush
features.description: If you are hidden from a creature when you cast a spell on it, the creature has disadvantage on any saving throw it makes against the spell.

features.name: Versatile Trickster
features.description: You gain the ability to distract targets with your Mage Hand.

features.name: Spell Thief
features.description: You gain the ability to magically steal the knowledge of how to cast a spell from another spellcaster.

name: College of Lore
description: Bards of the College of Lore know something about most things, collecting bits of knowledge from sources as diverse as scholarly tomes and peasant tales.

features.name: Bonus Proficiencies
features.description: You gain proficiency with three skills of your choice.

features.name: Cutting Words
features.description: You learn how to use your wit to distract, confuse, and otherwise sap the confidence and competence of others.

features.name: Additional Magical Secrets
features.description: You learn two spells of your choice from any class.

features.name: Peerless Skill
features.description: When you make an ability check, you can expend one use of Bardic Inspiration to add the Bardic Inspiration die to your ability check.

name: College of Valor
description: Bards of the College of Valor are daring skalds whose tales keep alive the memory of the great heroes of the past.

features.name: Bonus Proficiencies
features.description: You gain proficiency with medium armor, shields, and martial weapons.

features.name: Combat Inspiration
features.description: A creature that has a Bardic Inspiration die can use it to add to a weapon damage roll or to AC.

features.name: Extra Attack
features.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

features.name: Battle Magic
features.description: When you use your action to cast a bard spell, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

name: Oath of Devotion
description: The Oath of Devotion binds a paladin to the loftiest ideals of justice, virtue, and order.

features.name: Sacred Weapon
features.description: As an action, you can imbue one weapon with positive energy. For 1 minute, you add your Charisma modifier to attack rolls made with that weapon.

features.name: Turn the Unholy
features.description: As an action, you present your holy symbol and speak a prayer censuring fiends and undead.

features.name: Aura of Devotion
features.description: You and friendly creatures within 10 feet can't be charmed while you are conscious.

features.name: Purity of Spirit
features.description: You are always under the effects of a Protection from Evil and Good spell.

features.name: Holy Nimbus
features.description: As an action, you can emanate an aura of sunlight.

name: Oath of Vengeance
description: The Oath of Vengeance is a solemn commitment to punish those who have committed a grievous sin.

features.name: Abjure Enemy
features.description: As an action, you present your holy symbol and speak a prayer of denunciation.

features.name: Vow of Enmity
features.description: As a bonus action, you can utter a vow of enmity against a creature you can see within 10 feet.

features.name: Relentless Avenger
features.description: When you hit a creature with an opportunity attack, you can move up to half your speed as part of the same reaction.

features.name: Soul of Vengeance
features.description: When a creature under the effect of your Vow of Enmity makes an attack, you can use your reaction to make a melee weapon attack against that creature.

features.name: Avenging Angel
features.description: You can assume the form of an angelic avenger.

name: Hunter
description: Emulating the Hunter archetype means accepting your place as a bulwark between civilization and the terrors of the wilderness.

features.name: Hunter's Prey
features.description: You gain one of several features: Colossus Slayer, Giant Killer, or Horde Breaker.

features.name: Defensive Tactics
features.description: You gain one of several features: Escape the Horde, Multiattack Defense, or Steel Will.

features.name: Multiattack
features.description: You gain one of several features: Volley or Whirlwind Attack.

features.name: Superior Hunter's Defense
features.description: You gain one of several features: Evasion, Stand Against the Tide, or Uncanny Dodge.

name: Beast Master
description: The Beast Master archetype embodies a friendship between the civilized races and the beasts of the wild.

features.name: Ranger's Companion
features.description: You gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures.

features.name: Exceptional Training
features.description: On any of your turns when your beast companion doesn't attack, you can use a bonus action to command the beast to take the Dash, Disengage, or Help action.

features.name: Bestial Fury
features.description: When you command your beast companion to take the Attack action, the beast can make two attacks.

features.name: Share Spells
features.description: When you cast a spell targeting yourself, you can also affect your beast companion with the spell.

name: Draconic Bloodline
description: Your innate magic comes from draconic magic that was mingled with your blood or that of your ancestors.

features.name: Dragon Ancestor
features.description: You choose one type of dragon as your ancestor. You can speak, read, and write Draconic.

features.name: Draconic Resilience
features.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1 per sorcerer level, and you have natural armor.

features.name: Elemental Affinity
features.description: When you cast a spell that deals damage of the type associated with your draconic ancestry, you can add your Charisma modifier to that damage.

features.name: Dragon Wings
features.description: You gain the ability to sprout a pair of dragon wings from your back.

features.name: Draconic Presence
features.description: You can channel the dread presence of your dragon ancestor.

name: Wild Magic
description: Your innate magic comes from the wild forces of chaos that underlie the order of creation.

features.name: Wild Magic Surge
features.description: Your spellcasting can unleash surges of untamed magic.

features.name: Tides of Chaos
features.description: You can manipulate the forces of chance and chaos to gain advantage on one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

features.name: Bend Luck
features.description: You can twist fate using your wild magic. When another creature you can see makes an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can use your reaction and spend 2 sorcery points to roll 1d4 and apply the number rolled as a bonus or penalty.

features.name: Controlled Chaos
features.description: Whenever you roll on the Wild Magic Surge table, you can roll twice and use either number.

features.name: Spell Bombardment
features.description: When you roll damage for a spell and roll the highest number possible on any of the dice, choose one of those dice, roll it again, and add that roll to the damage.

name: The Fiend
description: You have made a pact with a fiend from the lower planes of existence, a being whose aims are evil.

features.name: Dark One's Blessing
features.description: When you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points, you gain temporary hit points.

features.name: Dark One's Own Luck
features.description: You can call on your patron to alter fate in your favor. When you make an ability check or saving throw, you can use this feature to add a d10 to your roll.

features.name: Fiendish Resilience
features.description: You can choose one damage type when you finish a short or long rest. You gain resistance to that damage type.

features.name: Hurl Through Hell
features.description: When you hit a creature with an attack, you can use this feature to instantly transport the target through the lower planes.

name: The Archfey
description: Your patron is a lord or lady of the fey, a creature of legend who holds secrets that were forgotten before the mortal races were born.

features.name: Fey Presence
features.description: As an action, you can cause each creature in a 10-foot cube originating from you to make a Wisdom saving throw against your warlock spell save DC.

features.name: Misty Escape
features.description: When you take damage, you can use your reaction to turn invisible and teleport.

features.name: Beguiling Defenses
features.description: You are immune to being charmed, and when another creature attempts to charm you, you can use your reaction to attempt to turn the charm back on that creature.

features.name: Dark Delirium
features.description: You can plunge a creature into an illusory realm.

name: The Hexblade
description: You have made your pact with a mysterious entity from the Shadowfell - a force that manifests in sentient magic weapons carved from the stuff of shadow.

features.name: Hexblade's Curse
features.description: As a bonus action, you place a curse on a creature you can see within 30 feet of you.

features.name: Hex Warrior
features.description: You gain proficiency with medium armor, shields, and martial weapons.

features.name: Accursed Specter
features.description: When you slay a humanoid, you can cause its spirit to rise from its corpse as a specter.

features.name: Armor of Hexes
features.description: Your hex grows more powerful. If the target cursed by your Hexblade's Curse hits you with an attack roll, roll a d6.

features.name: Master of Hexes
features.description: When the creature cursed by your Hexblade's Curse dies, you can apply the curse to a different creature.

name: Path of the Berserker
description: For some barbarians, rage is a means to an end - that end being violence.

features.name: Frenzy
features.description: You can go into a frenzy when you rage. While raging, you can make a single melee weapon attack as a bonus action on each of your turns.

features.name: Mindless Rage
features.description: You can't be charmed or frightened while raging.

features.name: Intimidating Presence
features.description: You can use your action to frighten someone with your menacing presence.

features.name: Retaliation
features.description: When you take damage from a creature that is within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to make a melee weapon attack against that creature.

name: Path of the Totem Warrior
description: The Path of the Totem Warrior is a spiritual journey, as the barbarian accepts a spirit animal as guide, protector, and inspiration.

features.name: Spirit Seeker
features.description: Yours is a path that seeks attunement with the natural world, giving you a kinship with beasts.

features.name: Totem Spirit
features.description: You choose a totem spirit and gain its feature. You must make or acquire a physical totem object.

features.name: Aspect of the Beast
features.description: You gain a magical benefit based on the totem animal of your choice.

features.name: Spirit Walker
features.description: You can cast the Commune with Nature spell, but only as a ritual.

features.name: Totemic Attunement
features.description: You gain a magical benefit based on a totem animal of your choice.

name: Way of the Open Hand
description: Monks of the Way of the Open Hand are the ultimate masters of martial arts combat.

features.name: Open Hand Technique
features.description: Whenever you hit a creature with one of the attacks granted by your Flurry of Blows, you can impose one of several effects on that target.

features.name: Wholeness of Body
features.description: You gain the ability to heal yourself. As an action, you can regain hit points.

features.name: Tranquility
features.description: You can enter a special meditation that surrounds you with an aura of peace.

features.name: Quivering Palm
features.description: You gain the ability to set up lethal vibrations in someone's body.

name: Way of Shadow
description: Monks of the Way of Shadow follow a tradition that values stealth and subterfuge.

features.name: Shadow Arts
features.description: You can use ki to duplicate the effects of certain spells.

features.name: Shadow Step
features.description: You gain the ability to step from one shadow into another.

features.name: Cloak of Shadows
features.description: You can use your action to become invisible in dim light or darkness.

features.name: Opportunist
features.description: You can exploit a creature's momentary distraction when it is hit by an attack.

name: Circle of the Land
description: The Circle of the Land is made up of mystics and sages who safeguard ancient knowledge and rites.

features.name: Bonus Cantrip
features.description: You learn one additional druid cantrip of your choice.

features.name: Natural Recovery
features.description: During a short rest, you can recover some of your magical energy.

features.name: Circle Spells
features.description: Your mystical connection to the land infuses you with the ability to cast certain spells.

features.name: Land's Stride
features.description: Moving through nonmagical difficult terrain costs you no extra movement.

features.name: Nature's Ward
features.description: You can't be charmed or frightened by elementals or fey.

features.name: Nature's Sanctuary
features.description: Creatures of the natural world sense your connection to nature and become hesitant to attack you.

name: Circle of the Moon
description: Druids of the Circle of the Moon are fierce guardians of the wilds.

features.name: Combat Wild Shape
features.description: You gain the ability to use Wild Shape on your turn as a bonus action, rather than as an action.

features.name: Circle Forms
features.description: The rites of your circle grant you the ability to transform into more dangerous animal forms.

features.name: Primal Strike
features.description: Your attacks in beast form count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance.

features.name: Elemental Wild Shape
features.description: You can expend two uses of Wild Shape to transform into an air elemental, earth elemental, fire elemental, or water elemental.

features.name: Thousand Forms
features.description: You can cast the Alter Self spell at will.

name: Alchemist
description: An Alchemist is an expert at combining reagents to produce mystical effects.

features.name: Tool Proficiency
features.description: You gain proficiency with alchemist's supplies.

features.name: Alchemist Spells
features.description: You always have certain spells prepared that don't count against your prepared spells.

features.name: Experimental Elixir
features.description: When you finish a long rest, you can magically produce an experimental elixir in an empty flask.

features.name: Alchemical Savant
features.description: You've developed masterful command of magical chemicals. Whenever you cast a spell using alchemist's supplies, you gain a bonus to spell damage or healing rolls.

features.name: Restorative Reagents
features.description: You can incorporate restorative reagents into some of your works.

features.name: Chemical Mastery
features.description: You have been exposed to so many chemicals that they pose little risk to you.

name: Artillerist
description: An Artillerist specializes in using magic to hurl energy, projectiles, and explosions.

features.name: Tool Proficiency
features.description: You gain proficiency with woodcarver's tools.

features.name: Artillerist Spells
features.description: You always have certain spells prepared that don't count against your prepared spells.

features.name: Eldritch Cannon
features.description: You've learned how to create a magical cannon. You can use an action to magically summon the cannon in an unoccupied space.

features.name: Arcane Firearm
features.description: You know how to turn a wand, staff, or rod into an arcane firearm.

features.name: Explosive Cannon
features.description: Every eldritch cannon you create is more destructive.

features.name: Fortified Position
features.description: You're a master at forming well-defended emplacements using Eldritch Cannon.

name: Battle Smith
description: Armies require protection, and someone has to put things back together if defenses fail. A combination of protector and medic, a Battle Smith is an expert at defending others and repairing both materiel and personnel.

features.name: Tool Proficiency
features.description: You gain proficiency with smith's tools.

features.name: Battle Smith Spells
features.description: You always have certain spells prepared that don't count against your prepared spells.

features.name: Battle Ready
features.description: Your combat training and experiments with magic have paid off. You gain proficiency with martial weapons and can use Intelligence for attack and damage rolls.

features.name: Steel Defender
features.description: Your tinkering has borne you a faithful companion, a steel defender.

features.name: Arcane Jolt
features.description: You learn new ways to channel arcane energy through your weapon attacks and your steel defender.

features.name: Improved Defender
features.description: Your Arcane Jolt and steel defender become more powerful.

name: School of Divination
description: The counsel of a diviner is sought by royalty and commoners alike, for all seek a clearer understanding of the past, present, and future. As a diviner, you strive to part the veils of space, time, and consciousness.

features.name: Divination Savant
features.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy a divination spell into your spellbook is halved.

features.name: Portent
features.description: Glimpses of the future begin to press in on your awareness. When you finish a long rest, roll two d20s and record the numbers rolled.

features.name: Expert Divination
features.description: Casting divination spells comes so easily to you that it expends only a fraction of your spellcasting efforts.

features.name: The Third Eye
features.description: You can use your action to increase your powers of perception.

features.name: Greater Portent
features.description: The visions in your dreams intensify and paint a more accurate picture in your mind of what is to come. You roll three d20s for your Portent feature.

name: School of Enchantment
description: You have honed your ability to magically entrance and beguile other people and monsters. Some enchanters are peacemakers who bewitch the violent to lay down their arms.

features.name: Enchantment Savant
features.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy an enchantment spell into your spellbook is halved.

features.name: Hypnotic Gaze
features.description: Your soft words and enchanting gaze can magically enthrall another creature.

features.name: Instinctive Charm
features.description: When a creature you can see within 30 feet makes an attack roll against you, you can use your reaction to divert the attack.

features.name: Split Enchantment
features.description: When you cast an enchantment spell of 1st level or higher that targets only one creature, you can have it target a second creature.

features.name: Alter Memories
features.description: You gain the ability to make a creature unaware of your magical influence on it.

name: School of Conjuration
description: You focus your studies on magic that produces objects and creatures out of thin air. You can conjure billowing clouds of killing fog or summon creatures from elsewhere to fight on your behalf.

features.name: Conjuration Savant
features.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy a conjuration spell into your spellbook is halved.

features.name: Minor Conjuration
features.description: You can use your action to conjure up an inanimate object in your hand or on the ground in an unoccupied space.

features.name: Benign Transposition
features.description: You can use your action to teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

features.name: Focused Conjuration
features.description: While you are concentrating on a conjuration spell, your concentration can't be broken as a result of taking damage.

features.name: Durable Summons
features.description: Any creature that you summon or create with a conjuration spell has 30 temporary hit points.

name: School of Transmutation
description: You are a student of spells that modify energy and matter. To you, the world is not a fixed thing, but eminently mutable.

features.name: Transmutation Savant
features.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy a transmutation spell into your spellbook is halved.

features.name: Minor Alchemy
features.description: You can temporarily alter the physical properties of one nonmagical object.

features.name: Transmuter's Stone
features.description: You can spend 8 hours creating a transmuter's stone that stores transmutation magic.

features.name: Shapechanger
features.description: You add the Polymorph spell to your spellbook. You can cast it on yourself without expending a spell slot.

features.name: Master Transmuter
features.description: You can use your action to consume the reserve of transmutation magic stored within your transmuter's stone.

name: Knowledge Domain
description: The gods of knowledge value learning and understanding above all. Some teach that knowledge is to be gathered and shared in libraries and universities.

features.name: Blessings of Knowledge
features.description: You learn two languages of your choice and gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

features.name: Channel Divinity: Knowledge of the Ages
features.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to tap into a divine well of knowledge.

features.name: Channel Divinity: Read Thoughts
features.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to read a creature's thoughts.

features.name: Potent Spellcasting
features.description: You add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with any cleric cantrip.

features.name: Visions of the Past
features.description: You can call up visions of the past that relate to an object or location.

name: Tempest Domain
description: Gods whose portfolios include the Tempest domain govern storms, sea, and sky. They include gods of lightning and thunder, gods of earthquakes, and some gods of violence.

features.name: Bonus Proficiencies
features.description: You gain proficiency with martial weapons and heavy armor.

features.name: Wrath of the Storm
features.description: When a creature within 5 feet hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to cause the creature to make a Dexterity saving throw.

features.name: Channel Divinity: Destructive Wrath
features.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to wield the power of the storm with unchecked ferocity.

features.name: Thunderbolt Strike
features.description: When you deal lightning damage to a Large or smaller creature, you can also push it up to 10 feet away from you.

features.name: Divine Strike
features.description: You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy.

features.name: Stormborn
features.description: You have a flying speed equal to your current walking speed whenever you are not underground or indoors.

name: Trickery Domain
description: Gods of trickery are mischief-makers and instigators who stand as a constant challenge to the accepted order among both gods and mortals.

features.name: Blessing of the Trickster
features.description: You can use your action to touch a willing creature other than yourself to give it advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

features.name: Channel Divinity: Invoke Duplicity
features.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to create an illusory duplicate of yourself.

features.name: Channel Divinity: Cloak of Shadows
features.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to vanish.

features.name: Divine Strike
features.description: You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with poison.

features.name: Improved Duplicity
features.description: You can create up to four duplicates of yourself, instead of one.

name: Nature Domain
description: Gods of nature are as varied as the natural world itself. They are patrons of druids and worship the forces of nature itself.

features.name: Acolyte of Nature
features.description: You learn one druid cantrip of your choice and gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

features.name: Bonus Proficiency
features.description: You gain proficiency with heavy armor.

features.name: Channel Divinity: Charm Animals and Plants
features.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to charm animals and plants.

features.name: Dampen Elements
features.description: When you or a creature within 30 feet takes acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, you can use your reaction to grant resistance to that damage.

features.name: Divine Strike
features.description: You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy.

features.name: Master of Nature
features.description: You gain the ability to command animals and plant creatures.

name: Samurai
description: The Samurai is a fighter who draws on an implacable fighting spirit to overcome enemies. A samurai's resolve is nearly unbreakable.

features.name: Bonus Proficiency
features.description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

features.name: Fighting Spirit
features.description: As a bonus action, you can give yourself advantage on weapon attack rolls until the end of your turn.

features.name: Elegant Courtier
features.description: Your discipline and attention to detail allow you to excel in social situations.

features.name: Tireless Spirit
features.description: When you roll initiative and have no uses of Fighting Spirit remaining, you regain one use.

features.name: Rapid Strike
features.description: You learn to trade accuracy for swift strikes.

features.name: Strength Before Death
features.description: If you take damage that reduces you to 0 hit points, you can delay falling unconscious.

name: Arcane Archer
description: An Arcane Archer studies a unique elven method of archery that weaves magic into attacks to produce supernatural effects.

features.name: Arcane Archer Lore
features.description: You learn magical theory or some of the secrets of nature.

features.name: Arcane Shot
features.description: You learn to unleash special magical effects with some of your shots.

features.name: Magic Arrow
features.description: You gain the ability to infuse arrows with magic.

features.name: Curving Shot
features.description: You learn how to direct an errant arrow toward a new target.

features.name: Ever-Ready Shot
features.description: Your magical archery is available whenever battle starts.

features.name: Improved Arcane Shot
features.description: Your Arcane Shot options become more powerful.

name: Swashbuckler
description: You focus your training on the art of the blade, relying on speed, elegance, and charm in equal parts.

features.name: Fancy Footwork
features.description: During your turn, if you make a melee attack against a creature, that creature can't make opportunity attacks against you for the rest of your turn.

features.name: Rakish Audacity
features.description: You add your Charisma modifier to your initiative rolls and you don't need advantage on your attack roll to use Sneak Attack.

features.name: Panache
features.description: You can make a Charisma (Persuasion) check to charm a humanoid.

features.name: Elegant Maneuver
features.description: You can use a bonus action to gain advantage on the next Dexterity (Acrobatics) or Strength (Athletics) check.

features.name: Master Duelist
features.description: If you miss with an attack roll, you can choose to roll it again with advantage.

name: Inquisitive
description: You excel at rooting out secrets and unraveling mysteries. You rely on your sharp eye for detail.

features.name: Ear for Deceit
features.description: You develop a talent for picking out lies.

features.name: Eye for Detail
features.description: You can use a bonus action to make a Wisdom (Perception) check or Intelligence (Investigation) check.

features.name: Insightful Fighting
features.description: You can use a bonus action to make a Wisdom (Insight) check against a creature you can see.

features.name: Steady Eye
features.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) or Intelligence (Investigation) checks if you move no more than half your speed.

features.name: Unerring Eye
features.description: You can sense the presence of illusions, shapechangers, and magic.

features.name: Eye for Weakness
features.description: You learn to exploit a creature's weaknesses.

name: Oath of the Ancients
description: The Oath of the Ancients is as old as the race of elves and the rituals of the druids. Paladins who swear this oath cast their lot with the side of the light in the cosmic struggle against darkness.

features.name: Nature's Wrath
features.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to invoke primeval forces to ensnare a foe.

features.name: Turn the Faithless
features.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to utter ancient words that are painful for fey and fiends to hear.

features.name: Aura of Warding
features.description: Ancient magic lies so heavily upon you that it forms an eldritch ward.

features.name: Undying Sentinel
features.description: When you are reduced to 0 hit points, you can choose to drop to 1 hit point instead.

features.name: Elder Champion
features.description: You can assume the form of an ancient force of nature.

name: Oath of Conquest
description: The Oath of Conquest calls to paladins who seek glory in battle and the subjugation of their enemies.

features.name: Conquering Presence
features.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to exude a terrifying presence.

features.name: Guided Strike
features.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to strike with supernatural accuracy.

features.name: Aura of Conquest
features.description: You constantly emanate a menacing aura while you're not incapacitated.

features.name: Scornful Rebuke
features.description: Those who dare to strike you are punished for their audacity.

features.name: Invincible Conqueror
features.description: You gain the ability to harness extraordinary martial prowess.

name: The Great Old One
description: Your patron is a mysterious entity whose nature is utterly foreign to the fabric of reality. It might come from the Far Realm, or it could be one of the elder gods.

features.name: Awakened Mind
features.description: You can communicate telepathically with any creature you can see within 30 feet of you.

features.name: Entropic Ward
features.description: You learn to magically ward yourself against attack and to turn an enemy's failed strike into good luck.

features.name: Thought Shield
features.description: Your thoughts can't be read by telepathy or other means unless you allow it.

features.name: Create Thrall
features.description: You gain the ability to infect a humanoid's mind with the alien magic of your patron.

name: The Celestial
description: Your patron is a powerful being of the Upper Planes. You have bound yourself to an ancient empyrean, solar, ki-rin, unicorn, or other entity.

features.name: Bonus Cantrips
features.description: You learn the Light and Sacred Flame cantrips.

features.name: Healing Light
features.description: You gain the ability to channel celestial energy to heal wounds.

features.name: Radiant Soul
features.description: Your link to the Celestial allows you to serve as a conduit for radiant energy.

features.name: Celestial Resilience
features.description: You gain temporary hit points whenever you finish a short or long rest.

features.name: Searing Vengeance
features.description: The radiant energy you channel allows you to resist death.

name: Circle of Dreams
description: Druids who are members of the Circle of Dreams hail from regions that have strong ties to the Feywild. The druids' guardianship of the natural world makes for a natural alliance between them and good-aligned fey.

features.name: Balm of the Summer Court
features.description: You become imbued with the blessings of the Summer Court.

features.name: Hearth of Moonlight and Shadow
features.description: Home can be wherever you are.

features.name: Hidden Paths
features.description: You can use the hidden, magical pathways of the Feywild.

features.name: Walker in Dreams
features.description: The magic of the Feywild grants you the ability to travel mentally or physically through dreamlands.

name: Circle of Wildfire
description: Druids within the Circle of Wildfire understand that destruction is sometimes the precursor of creation, such as when a forest fire promotes later growth.

features.name: Summon Wildfire Spirit
features.description: You can summon the primal spirit bound to your soul.

features.name: Enhanced Bond
features.description: The bond with your wildfire spirit enhances your destructive and restorative spells.

features.name: Cauterizing Flames
features.description: You gain the ability to turn death into magical flames that can heal or incinerate.

features.name: Blazing Revival
features.description: The bond with your wildfire spirit can save you from death.

name: Way of the Four Elements
description: You follow a monastic tradition that teaches you to harness the elements. When you focus your ki, you can align yourself with the forces of creation.

features.name: Disciple of the Elements
features.description: You learn magical disciplines that harness the power of the four elements.

features.name: Extra Elemental Discipline
features.description: You learn one additional elemental discipline of your choice.

features.name: Extra Elemental Discipline
features.description: You learn one additional elemental discipline of your choice.

features.name: Extra Elemental Discipline
features.description: You learn one additional elemental discipline of your choice.

name: Way of the Kensei
description: Monks of the Way of the Kensei train relentlessly with their weapons, to the point where the weapon becomes an extension of the body.

features.name: Path of the Kensei
features.description: You learn to extend your ki into your kensei weapons.

features.name: One with the Blade
features.description: You gain the ability to augment your weapons further with your ki.

features.name: Sharpen the Blade
features.description: You gain the ability to augment your weapons further with your ki.

features.name: Unerring Accuracy
features.description: Your mastery of weapons grants you extraordinary accuracy.

name: Path of the Zealot
description: Some deities inspire their followers to pitch themselves into a ferocious battle fury. These barbarians are zealots.

features.name: Divine Fury
features.description: You can channel divine fury into your weapon strikes.

features.name: Warrior of the Gods
features.description: Your soul is marked for endless battle.

features.name: Fanatical Focus
features.description: The divine power that fuels your rage can protect you.

features.name: Zealous Presence
features.description: You learn to channel divine fury to inspire zealotry in others.

features.name: Rage Beyond Death
features.description: The divine power that fuels your rage allows you to shrug off fatal blows.

name: Path of the Ancestral Guardian
description: Some barbarians hail from cultures that revere their ancestors. These tribes teach that the warriors of the past linger in the world as mighty spirits.

features.name: Ancestral Protectors
features.description: Spectral warriors appear when you enter your rage.

features.name: Spirit Shield
features.description: The guardian spirits that aid you can provide supernatural protection to those you defend.

features.name: Consult the Spirits
features.description: You gain the ability to consult with your ancestral spirits.

features.name: Vengeful Ancestors
features.description: Your ancestral spirits grow powerful enough to retaliate.

name: Gloom Stalker
description: Gloom Stalkers are at home in the darkest places. They venture boldly into the unknown, hunting down threats in the deepest shadows.

features.name: Dread Ambusher
features.description: You master the art of the ambush.

features.name: Umbral Sight
features.description: You gain darkvision and become invisible to creatures that rely on darkvision.

features.name: Iron Mind
features.description: You hone your ability to resist the mind-altering powers of your prey.

features.name: Stalker's Flurry
features.description: You learn to attack with such unexpected speed that you can turn a miss into another strike.

features.name: Shadowy Dodge
features.description: You can dodge in unforeseen ways, with wisps of supernatural shadow around you.

name: Fey Wanderer
description: A fey mystique surrounds you, thanks to the boon of an archfey, the shining fruit you ate from a talking tree, or a midnight stroll through the Feywild.

features.name: Dreadful Strikes
features.description: You augment your attacks with mind-scarring magic.

features.name: Otherworldly Glamour
features.description: Your fey qualities give you a supernatural charm.

features.name: Beguiling Twist
features.description: The magic of the Feywild guards your mind.

features.name: Fey Reinforcements
features.description: You can summon fey beings to aid you.

features.name: Misty Wanderer
features.description: You can slip in and out of the Feywild to move in a blink of an eye.

name: College of Glamour
description: The College of Glamour is the home of bards who mastered their craft in the vibrant realm of the Feywild. These bards use their magic to delight and captivate others.

features.name: Mantle of Inspiration
features.description: You gain the ability to weave a song of fey magic that imbues your allies with vigor.

features.name: Enthralling Performance
features.description: You can charge your performance with seductive fey magic.

features.name: Mantle of Majesty
features.description: You gain the ability to cloak yourself in a fey magic that makes others want to serve you.

features.name: Unbreakable Majesty
features.description: Your appearance permanently gains an otherworldly aspect that makes you look more lovely.

name: College of Whispers
description: Most folk are happy to welcome a bard into their midst. Bards of the College of Whispers use this to their advantage. They appear to be like other bards, but they secretly excel at espionage and deception.

features.name: Psychic Blades
features.description: You gain the ability to make your weapon attacks magically toxic to a creature's mind.

features.name: Words of Terror
features.description: You learn to infuse innocent-seeming words with an insidious magic.

features.name: Mantle of Whispers
features.description: You gain the ability to adopt a humanoid's persona.

features.name: Shadow Lore
features.description: You gain the ability to weave dark magic into your words.

name: Shadow Magic
description: You are a creature of shadow, for your innate magic comes from the Shadowfell itself.

features.name: Eyes of the Dark
features.description: You have darkvision with a range of 120 feet.

features.name: Strength of the Grave
features.description: Your existence in a twilight state between life and death makes you difficult to defeat.

features.name: Hound of Ill Omen
features.description: You gain the ability to call forth a howling creature of darkness.

features.name: Shadow Walk
features.description: You gain the ability to step from one shadow into another.

features.name: Umbral Form
features.description: You can spend 6 sorcery points as a bonus action to transform yourself into a shadowy form.

name: Warrior of the Elements
description: You follow a monastic tradition that teaches you to harness the elements. When you focus your ki, you can align yourself with the forces of creation.

features.name: Elemental Attunement
features.description: You can expend Focus Points to imbue yourself with elemental energy, gaining Reach and dealing elemental damage.

features.name: Manipulate Elements
features.description: You know the Elementalism spell.

features.name: Elemental Burst
features.description: You can expend Focus Points to cause elemental energy to burst in a sphere.

features.name: Stride of the Elements
features.description: While Elemental Attunement is active, you have a Fly Speed and Swim Speed.

features.name: Elemental Epitome
features.description: You gain resistance to damage and destructive benefits while Elemental Attunement is active.

name: Warrior of Shadow
description: Monks of the Warrior of Shadow follow a tradition that values stealth and subterfuge.

features.name: Shadow Arts
features.description: You gain Darkness, Darkvision, and Shadowy Figments.

features.name: Shadow Step
features.description: You can teleport between patches of darkness or dim light.

features.name: Improved Shadow Step
features.description: You can suffer no restrictions on where you teleport for a cost.

features.name: Cloak of Shadows
features.description: You can shroud yourself in shadows to become reduced to a partial incorporeal state.

name: Warrior of Mercy
description: Monks of the Warrior of Mercy manipulate the life force of others to bring aid to those in need or an end to those who are suffering.

features.name: Hand of Harm
features.description: You can use your Focus Points to deal extra necrotic damage.

features.name: Hand of Healing
features.description: You can use your Focus Points to heal creatures.

features.name: Implements of Mercy
features.description: You gain proficiency in Insight, Medicine, and the Herbalism Kit.

features.name: Physician's Touch
features.description: Your healing and harm abilities improve to cure conditions or poison foes.

features.name: Flurry of Healing and Harm
features.description: You can weave your healing and harming techniques into your Flurry of Blows.

features.name: Hand of Ultimate Mercy
features.description: You can bring the dead back to life.

name: Warrior of the Open Hand
description: Monks of the Warrior of the Open Hand are the ultimate masters of martial arts combat.

features.name: Open Hand Technique
features.description: You can manipulate your enemy's ki when you hit them with Flurry of Blows.

features.name: Wholeness of Body
features.description: You can heal yourself as a bonus action.

features.name: Fleet Step
features.description: You can use Step of the Wind immediately after another Bonus Action.

features.name: Quivering Palm
features.description: You can set up lethal vibrations in a creature's body.

name: Path of the World Tree
description: Your Rage taps into the life force of the World Tree.

features.name: Vitality of the Tree
features.description: Your Rage grants temporary hit points to you and allies.

features.name: Branches of the Tree
features.description: You can use your reaction to teleport enemies.

features.name: Battering Roots
features.description: Your reach increases and your weapons gain mastery properties.

features.name: Travel along the Tree
features.description: You can teleport yourself and allies.

name: College of Dance
description: Bards of the College of Dance know that the world is a stage and that everyone is a dancer.

features.name: Dazzling Footwork
features.description: You gain benefits while not wearing armor, including Agile Strikes and Unarmored Defense.

features.name: Inspiring Movement
features.description: You can move allies when enemies approach.

features.name: Tandem Footwork
features.description: You can boost your party's initiative.

features.name: Leading Evasion
features.description: You can share Evasion with nearby allies.

name: Circle of the Sea
description: Druids of the Circle of the Sea draw on the tempestuous power of the oceans.

features.name: Circle of the Sea Spells
features.description: You always have certain spells prepared.

features.name: Wrath of the Sea
features.description: You can manifest an aura of ocean spray that damages enemies.

features.name: Aquatic Affinity
features.description: Your aura grows and you gain a swim speed.

features.name: Stormborn
features.description: You gain a fly speed and resistances.

features.name: Oceanic Gift
features.description: You can share your aura with a willing creature.

name: Banneret (Purple Dragon Knight)
description: A Banneret inspires greatness in others by committing deeds of glory on the battlefield, serving as a beacon for their allies.

features.name: Rallying Cry
features.description: When you use your Second Wind feature, you can choose up to three creatures within 60 feet. They regain hit points equal to your fighter level.

features.name: Royal Envoy
features.description: You gain proficiency in Persuasion. If you are already proficient, you gain double proficiency bonus.

features.name: Inspiring Surge
features.description: When you use your Action Surge feature, you can choose one creature within 60 feet. That creature can make one melee or ranged weapon attack as a reaction.

features.name: Bulwark
features.description: When you use Indomitable to reroll a saving throw, you can choose one ally within 60 feet who also failed the save against the same effect to reroll theirs.

name: Psi Warrior
description: Psi Warriors harness the power of their mind to augment their physical prowess, infusing their weapons with psionic energy and moving objects with thought.

features.name: Psionic Power
features.description: You harbor a wellspring of psionic energy represented by Psionic Energy dice. You can use these dice to fuel various psionic powers like Protective Field, Psionic Strike, and Telekinetic Movement.

features.name: Telekinetic Adept
features.description: You master new ways to use your telekinesis, gaining the Psi-Powered Leap and Telekinetic Thrust features.

features.name: Guarded Mind
features.description: The psionic energy flowing through you bolsters your mind. You have resistance to psychic damage and if you start your turn charmed or frightened, you can end the effect.

features.name: Bulwark of Force
features.description: You can shield yourself and others with telekinetic force, granting half cover to yourself and allies within 30 feet.

features.name: Telekinetic Master
features.description: You can cast the Telekinesis spell. While concentrating on it, you can make a weapon attack as a bonus action.

name: Way of Tranquility
description: Monks who seek to end conflict through peace and diplomacy.

features.name: Path of Tranquility
features.description: You can cast Sanctuary on yourself and have advantage on charisma checks to calm emotions.

features.name: Healing Hands
features.description: You have a pool of healing power to restore hit points.

features.name: Emissary of Peace
features.description: You gain +2 to Charisma checks and proficient in Peace.

features.name: Anger of a Gentle Soul
features.description: You gain a massive damage boost against creatures that hurt your allies.

name: Oath of the Crown
description: The Oath of the Crown is sworn to the ideals of civilization, be it the spirit of a nation, fealty to a sovereign, or service to a deity of law and ruling.

features.name: Champion Challenge
features.description: You compel creatures to do battle with you.

features.name: Turn the Tide
features.description: You can bolster injured creatures with your Channel Divinity.

features.name: Divine Allegiance
features.description: You can use your reaction to take damage intended for another creature.

features.name: Unyielding Saint
features.description: You have advantage on saving throws to avoid being paralyzed or stunned.

features.name: Exalted Champion
features.description: You become an avatar of war, resistant to damage.

name: Oath of Glory
